website_summaries.verdict: A bright green tea that can be enjoyed as a drink or in a dessert.
pros: The Zen Spirit matcha is an appealing bright green color
It is culinary grade, so it works well in tea lattes, but is also perfect for baking
The powder blends well, leaving no chunks in hot or cold water
When brewed, matcha gives off a pleasant, subtle green tea scent
cons: Packaging makes it difficult to get the matcha out

customer_reviews.title: Great, but small package...
customer_reviews.text: The product is good, beautiful green color, but boy, I need to pay better detail to the description! This is a small bag, in fact, it is more like a packet. At 1tsp serving size maybe I will get 5 out of it? Wish there was a pic of a person holding the product.
customer_reviews.author: Tx8606

customer_reviews.title: My New Favorite Brand
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using cacao powder for years in drinks, homemade ice cream, hot chocolate, on yogurt, cooking, etc, and love it for the flavor. The fact that something seemingly so decadent and rich is actually very good for you is a plus. I put it in my coffee for an extra energy boost. This is the first time I tried the Zen Spirit brand, but it won’t be the last. I had small amount left of my previous brand so compared the flavor. Zen Spirit is noticeably more flavorful and rich. It dissolves well. Everything I’ve read and researched about this company indicates that this pure, well-sourced and carefully processed.
customer_reviews.author: Helen

customer_reviews.title: Pantry Staple
customer_reviews.text: Matcha lattes are by far one of my favorite beverages and this product delivers. Vibrant green in color and packed with flavor, I absolutely will purchase again. It's just SO good and part of my daily routine! Matcha Latte: 1tsp matcha 3 tsp hot water WHISK THOROUGHLY (no clumps!) Add steamed milk to taste (I use almond milk) Add sugar to taste Sprinkle matcha over the top *You can also make this iced by adding cold milk with ice instead of steaming it first. *Sometimes I add a few drops of vanilla extract as well, enhancing the flavor - give it a try!
customer_reviews.author: Julianne Walsh

customer_reviews.title: Very good tasting but Not worth the $10 this picture is ...
customer_reviews.text: Disappointing should specific how big the package actually is. Very good tasting but Not worth the $10 this picture is the size comparison to a freaking spoon.....
customer_reviews.author: KT

customer_reviews.title: Cocoa vs Cacao
customer_reviews.text: Possible nutritional benefits aside, cacao is very similar to regular cocoa powder in flavor and use. Slightly different colors in powder form (cacao is on the right), but the same smooth texture. Very similar brownies were the result of identical recipes baked at the same time (cacao is on the top). Cacao seems to have a more "real" chocolate flavor which I preferred. The rest of the family's opinion was split. This is a good product that I will buy again. I think my next project will be homemade hot chocolate!
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Love this Matcha Tea Powder
customer_reviews.text: Love this Matcha Tea Powder! It's great as a tea, but my favorite is to make it as a green tea smoothie. I add milk, ice, honey, vanilla creamer, and two or three servings of the matcha powder, depending how much matcha I'm in the mood for. Works well when i need a little mid day boost and do not want to drink coffee.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Best organic Dietary supplements
customer_reviews.text: When I got it i wasn't sure how i would use it but for the past few days I have baked it use it on icecream and mixed it with milkshakes and hot chocolate with milk and by day 4 I was feeling energetic and cleansed it smells like fudge and mix well with just about everything I love it a great supplement its organic and you don't need much just a teaspoon and low calories too I'm so happy with it and taste Amazing
customer_reviews.author: Jabs32styles

customer_reviews.title: Healthy and Delicious
customer_reviews.text: There is nothing better than something healthy except when that healthy something is so yummy. I didn't really like matcha tea before I tried this, but it's probably because I wasn't using quality tea. The powder dissolves well in liquids and now I have my matcha lattè every morning. The pictures show morning cold latte, made with almond milk, Zen Spirit matcha powder and maple syrup.
customer_reviews.author: jaide76

customer_reviews.title: This is a great healthy drink
customer_reviews.text: This is a great healthy drink, the powder is a rich green color, it tastes just like a regular green tea you would get in Starbucks. I tried this product because it is organic, I will be trying it next time with the some fresh mint leaves to make the drink more refreshing. This is a great small packet that if you do not like it you have not wasted lots of money, this is a great price for organic green t.
customer_reviews.author: A  Manners

customer_reviews.title: Nom-nom Matcha....
customer_reviews.text: Tasty product that seems to give me a little extra energy. There are no recipes or instructions on how to make the product, so just do a search online to find some ideas. It tastes and smells like very strong green tea. My favorite mix is just matcha and 50/50 hot water and almond milk, with some honey and vanilla. It has been recommended to me to blend the product because it can be pretty chunky. Make sure to keep stirring it when you drink it so that all the chunks don't wind up in your last drink. :)
customer_reviews.author: WlddoveTop Contributor: Makeup

customer_reviews.title: Highest quality matcha I've ever tried!
customer_reviews.text: This is excellent matcha! I compared it to the bag I purchased less than a year ago (the bag says it's good for 12-18 months) from a different brand, and the difference is huge! This matcha (on the left in the pictures) is a vibrant green and smells amazing. The other stuff is a brownish green and has a hay-like smell. I only got into matcha within the last year, so I guess I didn't know how to spot the good stuff. Now I know! This is it! I love to use this in tea, cookies, smoothies, or in a vanilla milkshake. It's delicious!
customer_reviews.author: Alyson RiceTop Contributor: Baking

customer_reviews.title: Not impressive with the quality.
customer_reviews.text: Not so good. Haven't used them for about 20 days. Kept in my shelf as such without opening. I saw some strands of web kind of fibres indicating some kind of deterioration.
customer_reviews.author: sri v.

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Not sure if I got bad batch? These did not gel when I soaked 1.5 Tbsp in 3/4 cup of almond milk overnight for 9hrs. So, I tried adding 2 Tbsp more and came back after another 9hrs... it just sat at the bottom of the cup. Nice packaging overall...
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly

customer_reviews.title: Chia Love..
customer_reviews.text: Marvelous! At first glance, the packaging is quite lovely, and very appealing. The description of the product is quite clear, and the directions were simple to understand. My first tasting experience was covering a banana in honey peanut butter, with the Chia Seeds sprinkled on top! Delicious! My second tasting was a homemade chicken salad, sprinkled with the Chia Seeds..Yummy! Awesome product, and extremely versatile..❤
customer_reviews.author: EllieMae

customer_reviews.title: matcha smoothies and lattes anyone?
customer_reviews.text: Wife loves it and so i love it because wife loves it. I love it because wife loves it and it makes my life easier so I love it. No more hunting matcha green teen in whole foods or trader joes. She uses this to mix with smoothies as well as match latte drinks at home. Tastes really good too so she says but i don't like anything green in my smoothies or lattes. Especially when she tries to hide Kale in the green smoothies and says no honey there is no kale in this smoothie. Hmm... yea right no green stuff please!!! ok getting digressed sorry.
customer_reviews.author: Starcraft2WOOT

customer_reviews.title: Buy something else
customer_reviews.text: This matcha doesn’t have good flavor. The color is not very bright green, and even in lattes it doesn’t taste very good. It doesn’t seem very fresh at all. I have had worse, but for all the more this cost, I will not even use this for baking. The only good things I can say about it are that it froths well and blends well. I will not buy this again and cannot recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Alex :-)

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality and Value
customer_reviews.text: This was great. I used to drink this daily and had this part of my amazon monthly subscription, but It went out of stock for 2 months, so I had to change brands, and now I am too lazy to switch back. If my other one goes out of stock, I will defiantly switch back to this one. The powder is fine and nice, Don't know if the matcha is making my life better or improving my health, but social media and science says its suppose to do something, so I drink it daily ./
customer_reviews.author: Eric Magoo

customer_reviews.title: Great chocolate
customer_reviews.text: I am not a huge chocolate person, but my wife and kids sure are. They enjoy making hot chocolate, but it took them several tries because they could not get the recipe just the way they liked. The smell of the chocolate was amazing, even for me and I do not eat chocolate often. The chocolate tasted great in cookies, and we have used for brownies as well. The cacao was good enough that it may not last the full 45 days that the package says it will stay fresh.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony

customer_reviews.title: THE PACKAGING IS A PROBLEM
customer_reviews.text: When I opened up the zip lock bag for the first time the zip lock strip came apart, so I can't seal the bag. Hate it when that happens. Could be a fluke or bad zip lock bags. The product is great though. I put the whole original bag inside another clear zip lock bag. I will survive.
customer_reviews.author: sharon

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality Cacao - Poor Packaging
customer_reviews.text: The cacao powder was WAY OVER FILLED in the bag. When it arrived and I opened the bag about 8 tablespoons of powder spilled out because there was an excessive amount of powder in the bag. After opening, the resealable park of the bag was broken and only attached to one side of the bag. Other than the packaging mishap the cacao powder is VERY GOOD QUALITY. I was expecting it to be more bitter than it was but I could tolerate it by itself or adding to warm milk and drinking. Overall, put less cacao in the bag so it opens easier and fix the resealable issue and it will be a 5 star product.
customer_reviews.author: Dan Parson

customer_reviews.title: Good bang for your buck
customer_reviews.text: I keep coming back to this. I'm obsessed with matcha in general like matcha everything! I buy a lot of different types of matcha and try them. If you're a matcha lover yourself, you know how expensive a little bit of it can be. I feel like this product in particular is quite strong in flavor but you get a good amount for $20. I've bought $25+ matcha for as much as a palm size amount. Pretty happy with this. Although if you're looking for one with a bright green color, this one does not provide that. The color is more of a faded/dull green.
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: But taste good.
customer_reviews.text: Sooooo smalll. Technically enough for 2 try. So, $5 a cup is a pricy experience. But taste good.
customer_reviews.author: Ady

customer_reviews.title: I've tried it in a few different ways but it's not really what I was looking for and I was very disappointed by the size
customer_reviews.text: VERY small amount for the price. And it's very bitter and musky tasting. I've tried it in a few different ways but it's not really what I was looking for and I was very disappointed by the size.
customer_reviews.author: Carmen

customer_reviews.title: Good chai seeds
customer_reviews.text: These are great chai seeds. As with all chai seeds I don’t care for the flavor all that much. But they can be mixed in with a variety of things. I enjoy them in my eggs. Overall great product and would buy again if I need more chai seeds.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: What can you say about Cacao?
customer_reviews.text: Well, I've been looking for a cacao that has a good, NON-bitter taste and I've tried quite a few. Many cacaos that I've tasted, turn out to be bitter and have a horrible aftertaste and most are not cheap! Not this one! I love this cacao! And the amount of great product you get for a fantastic price is a special find. I use this in my smoothies, I add it to coffee, blend it with golden milk, make hot chocolate and I make KETO candies with it too. Thank you for this great quality cacao! Please keep it available on Amazon!
customer_reviews.author: D.Jones

customer_reviews.title: Flavorless
customer_reviews.text: To my disappointment this cacao powder didn’t meet my expectations. I bought thinking that it might be better than the one I always buy ( TruVibe Organic Raw Cacao) but it wasn’t. It was tasteless and I had to add more to get at least some flavor. Needless to say that it didn’t last as long as TruVibe. Another thing the bag is loaded with powder that it was impossible for me to close it once I opened it. I had to put in a Ziplock bag. They need to pack it in a bigger bag,
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful green color!
customer_reviews.text: This matcha is delicious and has a beautiful green color!...just be aware that this is a small package...I’m actually ordering more today& getting on the subscription so it’s a bit cheaper!...it has a note on the package that once it’s opened you must use it within 45 days-so it’s actually good that it does come in a small package 😊 I give this tea a👍👍👍👍👍ps. It blends well too-no lumps!
customer_reviews.author: kay

customer_reviews.title: Good product just too small of a portion
customer_reviews.text: I really wish I had read the size of this Match as it's literally just a tiny pouch which you might get about 5 servings out of it. Due to the price for the amount, I ended up finding another certified organic Match product that was a much better price and comparable quality. LOOK AT THE SIZE BEFORE BUYING!!!!!!! If you are Daddy Warlocks and can go through these expensive pouches, then go for it. I'm not.
customer_reviews.author: Selective Buyer 84

customer_reviews.title: Makes great hot chocolate.
customer_reviews.text: Makes great hot chocolate. I use 1 teaspoon in hot water with 6 to 12 drops of Monk fruit and whipped cream and have a cup of hot chocolate as a diabetic with maybe two carbs of sugar which is nothing in comparison to what a real cup of hot chocolate would do to my blood sugar! Love it and will continue to buy! Keep stirring or it will settle in the bottom of the cup. Taste great! The only way a diabetic can have a real cup of hot chocolate!
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Mowrey BMTop Contributor: Karaoke

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my morning smoothie
customer_reviews.text: Vibrant green color, not murky or brownish like some other brands! I only put this in my morning smoothie, for a little pick-me-up, instead of my normal coffee. The taste isnt too bad, but tea is suppose to be bitter. I mix it with a bunch or fruit, so its only slightly noticeable......besides turning the smoothie green, lol. I'll definitely buy it again, after i run out of the one I got. I do wish it came in a bigger size, as I'll burn through the 3.5oz bag in less than a month (>_<)
customer_reviews.author: Razeel211

customer_reviews.title: I received watch bands instead of TEA!
customer_reviews.text: I received watch bands instead of Matcha Green Tea! What makes things worse is that I am unable to return this item, which means I am out $20!! Update: Amazon gave me a full refund and I was able to repurchase this product. I am use this product to make lattes in the morning, subbing it for coffee. It is working out fine although I have problems with the tea sinking to the bottom. I think I need one of the kabuki things.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay D.C

customer_reviews.title: Great For Smoothies
customer_reviews.text: I love to add different items to my smoothies to mix it up a bit. I use this Cacao powder now and it it's great. Honestly, I can't even taste a difference which is good since I'm adding it to a fruit smoothie. It doesn't change the fruity taste. I'd like to try to add it to other things, like yogurt or ice cream. The only downside is the bag is really hard to close. It doesn't seem like the self closing liner is lined up or even strong enough. I just use a clip to close it so it's not really a huge deal. Overall, this Cacao powder is good.
customer_reviews.author: Missy B

customer_reviews.title: Good, on the expensive side, but probably worth it
customer_reviews.text: Bit expensive - I got the smallest pack which has 10 servings so it's about 60 cents per cup, but this was way better than the other matcha powder I tried, Matchaccino's "Starter Matcha (16oz/453g) - USDA Organic, Non-GMO Certified, Vegan and Gluten-Free. Pure Matcha Green Tea Powder. Grassy Flavor with Mild Natural Bitterness and Autumn-Green color" ( This one was vibrant and green and when mixed with hot water tasted like a good quality matcha (not that I'm an expert) - it had a robust flavour and was slightly bitter but not overwhelmingly so. Probably still worth the price if you purchase a bigger packet too.
customer_reviews.author: ragdollmoll

customer_reviews.title: So creamy and good for you too
customer_reviews.text: I just bought this and I could not be happier. It is rich and creamy (but not too rich) and the perfect amount of moist for my delicious hot chocolate. I add just a touch of sugar and I am all warmed up and happy for my morning. I cannot wait to try it in all my baking. Just so you know, they do not skimp on the amount of cocoa brimming inside this gorgeous package. I cut the top of it and the stuff poured out. I also cannot believe the ingredients. I've just now started buying more healthy products, and this is 100% organic and vegan, too. Love that:)
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa M Miller

customer_reviews.title: Tatse good and are fresh
customer_reviews.text: These chia seeds are good quality, fresh, and tatse good. I thought they were ground when I felt the package but it was just full. Which I like, less packaging wasted and plastic created for no reason. I would definitely buy again or gwybaoke for friends to turn them into fans haha
customer_reviews.author: Nihx Knows

customer_reviews.title: This matcha is the best for the money!!!
customer_reviews.text: You get what you paid for... Which means this Is the best culinary matcha product for the money. It doesn’t taste like it has ceremonial quality to it. Taste more like an culinary quality blend matcha tea. The best thing is that you aren’t getting any dirt like in other brands. Spend more on ceremonial quality ones and you will be proud of yourself after that kind investment.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Squire

customer_reviews.title: this would be good for baking
customer_reviews.text: this matcha is not high quality for sipping tea or green tea lattes. this would be good for baking. the matcha does not dissolve into water or milk as much as expected from a "high quality" matcha
customer_reviews.author: The Director

customer_reviews.title: I am a daily smoothie maker and like to add different "superfoods" and options when I come ...
customer_reviews.text: I am a daily smoothie maker and like to add different "superfoods" and options when I come across them. However I am also quite picky as to what I put in my body. This product solves both! I am confident in the quality and have been using it daily and I can definitely tell a positive difference! Along with this, I was told by a friend that it works well as a meat tenderizer, etc. as well and just tried that this past weekend - WOW! I am looking forward to making future purchases of this product to keep it in my diet.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon Stranzl

customer_reviews.title: Short Shelf Life
customer_reviews.text: Had I known the bag suggests using before the bag has been opened for 40 days, I would not have bought it. I will not use even half the bag in that time. I feel I have wasted a lot of money, although the product is very nice. For anyone with family members to share it with, it might be fine.
customer_reviews.author: Toni

customer_reviews.title: Delicious Product
customer_reviews.text: Fast delivery! I opened product and tasted. It was very pleasing. Then I ate a rounded teaspoon of it. Very good. This is not sweet chocolate but it's not unpleasantly bitter either. The consistency is that of powdered sugar so be careful if you have a dog to keep it away from them. Otherwise, no ill effects! I'll use this.
customer_reviews.author: Boot Lover

customer_reviews.title: Lots of product for the price
customer_reviews.text: This is a really good product for the price it offers. Super quick to ship. The taste is equal to Hershey’s unsweetened cocoa in my opinion. It taste good in coffee and baking products. The only thing I haven’t noticed a difference with is energy level, though I do have a 1 year old so that probably is the reason lol. I would purchase this again but it’ll probably be awhile because you get a LOT of product. Side note! When you open it there is so much product that you may need to store it in a ziplock baggie or sealable container. :)
customer_reviews.author: Katelynn

customer_reviews.title: Thumbs up!!!
customer_reviews.text: I just received this the other day and already love it! So far I have been using it in smoothies and it is a great source of energy but is also super tasty. It is very fine and doesn't leave a gritty feeling in my mouth like some other powders that I have tried. I have already been searching on pinterest for other new recipes to try with my matcha! This product definitely gets a thumbs up for me. I will be re-ordering for sure. If you are considering purchasing this product, definitely give it a try!
customer_reviews.author: BeccaTop Contributor: Baking

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: I love how these are sealed in an opaque bag so light cannot get in and alter the look or flavor. Chia seeds are pricey and I was happy to see a whole pound for such a great price. These work really well in whatever you are cooking or baking.
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne Arthurs

customer_reviews.title: Great product and wonderful customer service!
customer_reviews.text: My husband absolutely loves making matcha lattes with this powder! When I recently ordered it again for him, it unfortunately arrived with a cut that must have been received during packaging, and its contents were spilled out. When I contacted Zen Spirit about the issue, they responded promptly and were very understanding, and a replacement package arrived a mere two days later! Will definitely order again, not only because we love the product, but because they have such wonderful customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Patty

customer_reviews.title: Pricey, but worth it
customer_reviews.text: I originally purchased this a few months ago and loved it, but didn't love the price, so I tried another brand where I got a lot more product for same price. I immediately noticed a difference. The other stuff was much darker in color and tasted slightly different. The results were the biggest difference though; I just didn't have the same energy/focus as I did with this brand. So i switched back, and so glad I did! I am super focused now! It's more expensive than some other products, but definitely worth it in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: Monica

customer_reviews.title: Recommend Trying
customer_reviews.text: The packaging is superb; however, once opened, it made a small mess. I wish caffeine was an ingredient not listed because it's not always healthy. Regardless, after I tried it, I noticed it was bitter, so I recommend using juice to mix it in fully. Furthermore, I did have an increase of energy, and I hope to see more benefits long term.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Packaging Fail
customer_reviews.text: I'm recently into matcha, so I can't say if it the matcha itself is pristine or poor, but I can vouch for the poor packaging. Typically packaging isn't something I consider in a product like this, but it is impact full in this case. The resealable zipper did not seal at all. I thought there was something caught in the track, but even after attempting to clean it out it didn't seal. I was very careful to prop up the package to prevent it from spilling, but of course, it got knocked over one time and half the product spilled out. If the zipper worked I would have given it a higher rating.
customer_reviews.author: Roni

customer_reviews.title: My third time ordering
customer_reviews.text: I add these chia seeds to my oatmeal every morning, pouring them into the bowl and topping with quick oats before microwaving. They're fresh, with a nice flavor, and add a nice healthy boost. Will continue to buy.
customer_reviews.author: jonibirdbrain

customer_reviews.title: Flavor
customer_reviews.text: I have used this product once. A smoothy. I followed a recipe of banana, cacao, milk , peanut butter and honey. I enjoyed the flavor and texture. It had a little bitter after taste but with some experimentation that will pass. I am a fan of dark chocolate and I believe this will "fill the bill". I want to add this to my coffee in time.
customer_reviews.author: Charlie A

customer_reviews.title: Great Organic Matcha!
customer_reviews.text: I decided to give up coffee Monday - Friday (with only a cup on the weekends) and starting drinking matcha instead during the week. I have noticed that it still gives me the energy that coffee does but without the jitters. I make "matcha lattes" and blend the matcha in a blender with other health supplements, cinnamon, turmeric, and a little agave nectar with water. I have drank the matcha both hot and also left it in the fridge over night to have an "iced matcha latte" both were delicious! I will continue to get this product!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous
customer_reviews.text: I will admit that I was a little hesitant to try something new, but I had heard great things about how much this helped people to feel more energized during the day and I decided to give it a try. I am in love with this stuff. It is just the right amount of energy without making me feel shaky or nervous, which sometimes has happened in the past. This is a perfect solution to anyone looking to add organic and healthy nutrition to your diet as well, and it is vegan! Update: I still am in love with this product. You should give it a try. It is worth it.
customer_reviews.author: lch89

customer_reviews.title: This is the best tasting matcha I have found in a long time.
customer_reviews.text: It was delicious and just what I was looking for the only thing that would make it more perfect is if it came in bulk and in a nice top of my counter canister especially since the ziplock ripped when I was only halfway through the bag and I had to keep it in an ugly ziplock bag for freshness. However the Matcha tea was so delicious I just placed another order.
customer_reviews.author: siamese117

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality tea!
customer_reviews.text: This is a repeat purchase for me. The tea is very refined and smooth. I drink it almost every day hot with honey. I feel it does my body good and will continue to repurchase it. Also, their customer service is excellent!. Although the packaging is appropriate for the product (and beautiful) it does not work for me. For my own personal use I have to put it in another container to be able to easily get a spoon in and out of it. The product is a bit pricey but worth it! Thanks Zen Spirit.
customer_reviews.author: Ofelia

customer_reviews.title: Kinda in love
customer_reviews.text: This is the stuff we should be consuming, if we're going to consume chocolate. Okay, so it's a lil bitter. No, but really. I put this in my protein shake and it's amazing what it does for the body. Here is where you get health benefits from chocolate. I'll also add a little to hot cocoa or brownies or something to enrich the chocolate experience.
customer_reviews.author: C. Chesley

customer_reviews.title: Love this matcha!
customer_reviews.text: Not all matches are the same!! I've tried many different kinds of matcha, I'd say this is my favorite of this price point. The color is a nice, bright earthy green, and the flavor is fantastic, there is no bitter aftertaste. I like to steep 2 bags of black tea, remove the tea bags, mix 1 tsp of this matcha, plain powdered non dairy creamer and a little raw honey. After everything is mixed together, I pour it over ice. I just purchased the 1 oz bag last week and I'm already out. Going to get me the 4 oz drink now. I no longer have to rely on coffee to keep me awake! Best drink ever!!
customer_reviews.author: Stardust Reviews

customer_reviews.title: it does work and gives me a great energy boost
customer_reviews.text: I haven't ever used Matcha teas before, so I was skeptical. However, it does work and gives me a great energy boost. I am not a coffee drinker, as it gives me the jitters and makes me crash. This tea was great and the effects lasted for hours. I would not recommend using it alone. I tried it as a hot tea and it tasted horrible and it does not dissolve well. Had a tomato like taste alone. I mix it with my green smoothies and it's great! I will continue to use this!
customer_reviews.author: Robyn J.

customer_reviews.title: Really good!
customer_reviews.text: Maybe it's dumb, but I was a little hesitant to try cacao--I wasn't sure how different it is to cocoa. I am loving this stuff! I use it in everything: baking, smoothies, ice cream (when I make homemade chocolate). I use at least two tablespoons at a time and I have barely gotten halfway through the bag. It's lasting a long time. Why didn't I give it five stars? Just because I rarely do that for anything.
customer_reviews.author: K. Landon

customer_reviews.title: Energy for the afternoon
customer_reviews.text: I was told to get this tea because it doesn't give you a caffeine rush like coffee. It is gradual, and lasts several hours. It does seem to help me sleep better, too. I drink it at 2 pm. It is bitter, so you will want to add a lot of milk and honey or a sweetener. It is very hard to mix. I know they suggest a bamboo whisk, but I don't feel it would properly clean after use. I use a fork to stir it and it never seems to be complete.
customer_reviews.author: Nan

customer_reviews.title: High quality, great flavor
customer_reviews.text: I loved the cacao powder. This is the third brand I have used and it is my favorite. Awesome flavor, high quality. I have used it to make cacao hot chocolate, vegan energy bites, and coconut cacao ice cream. Everything has been a hit! I was pleasantly surprised with the exceptional flavor, makes the other brands I have tried seem "stale". It also dissolves better than other two brands. Will definitely purchase this again!!
customer_reviews.author: Kate Steeb

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic stuff!!!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this product!! I got it because I love green tea and I love matcha! I've never tried a powder before, but I've absolutely fallen in love with this! And make it every morning with two ounces of almond milk, 6 ounces of water, heat that up for 2 minutes and then I put it in a blender cup with the teaspoon of matcha powder. Blending it like this makes it like a beautiful matcha green tea latte!! I can't get enough of this, and I completely recommend it to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: JaysonTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Wasted $20
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately my bag of matcha came and looks like the inside seal is dry rotted with the plastics broken and fallen down into the bag. Therefor I can't even consume the $20 worth of matcha I just bought. Not happy at all! And there is no way for me to “return” the product since it’s food related. They won’t even allow me to ask for a refund. Very disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Toni

customer_reviews.title: Love what Matcha has done for my metabolism.. Put a kick in my step.
customer_reviews.text: I was impressed with the Matcha green tea! I tried making it like any other green tea which ended up tasting okay with a slight sweet flavor but keep in mind it did have a veggie taste as well. Make sure you shake up or mix the powder until it is fully dissolved. This product really did put a punch in my step as well as my metabolism.. hours after only consuming 1 tsp I was still going strong. I would recommend starting out with 1/2 tsp per day before upping it to a whole tsp, this is pure organic and does was it says on the package.
customer_reviews.author: Kari Lynn

customer_reviews.title: I paid $11 for this tiny bag?
customer_reviews.text: Ive seen a lot of pictures and thought....oh thats not so bad, its smaller than thought but thats okay it should be enough! Boy was i suprised. My heart sank as i opened my box to find the tiniest bag ever. I havent tried the actual product its self yet, but im very disappointed right now. I feel gyped out of at least $6. Literally could be a sample size. 😑
customer_reviews.author: BiohazardBeauty

customer_reviews.title: I love it
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is great. Had to decrease my caffeine because of anxiety issues, ordered this. Mix 1 teaspoon with hot water, then pour over ice. It settles over time so I keep adding ice and water throughout the morning and it's like a bottomless cup of green tea while I work from home. It really does give a kick too. From 6-9 teaspoons of coffee a day to one of green tea (with a week of near abstinence in between). I suspect the 3.5 oz package will last me about a month or so, been drinking for two weeks and there's still plenty.
customer_reviews.author: Nate

customer_reviews.title: Delicious smoothie additive!
customer_reviews.text: I’m using this as a smoothie additive, the flavor is great and there is a ton of cacao in this bag. I love that it’s organic,And supposedly there are many health benefits to adding this to foods. At some point I might try to use this for baking purposes as well. The powder is very finely ground, so it mixes nicely.
customer_reviews.author: C. Berman

customer_reviews.title: EXCELLENT TASTE AND QUALITY
customer_reviews.text: I keep ordering it ahead of time as I don't want to run out. With a heart condition this is an excellent source of magnesium that is good for the heart. I enjoy a morning coffee with this, powdered collagen, raw sugar and grass-fed cow's milk from my frother--yum, yum, and oh so healthy.
customer_reviews.author: Marlene Czarnecka Coyne

customer_reviews.title: First Experience with Matcha - Wow
customer_reviews.text: Admittedly my first experience with culinary grade, however this has already completely replaced my morning coffee. Although it does have less caffeine (~80mg) than the average cup of coffee (~95mg) per serving, the effect of feeling more energized and focused far outperforms the need for more caffeine. My mood even feels a bit elevated, and I'm particularly dubious when it comes to supplemental-style intake. Bitter naturally, adding a teaspoon of honey or agave nectar really brings this around to a nice tea. No experience with baking/cooking with it yet.
customer_reviews.author: Christian K Whittington

customer_reviews.title: I paid more for a smaller amount
customer_reviews.text: I have been using green tea powder into my smoothies every morning and it is not easy for me to describe how this bland tastes different from my previous Matcha made by other blands. I like the quality and the package but disappointed with the small quantity for the price I paid.
customer_reviews.author: SUE

customer_reviews.title: Not for everyday use
customer_reviews.text: Previously I purchased another brand of Matcha (to use in morning smoothies and for green tea lattes). The prior purchase was organic and cost about twice as much for more than 10 times more matcha (a 16 oz size). I thought this brand might be so extraordinary it would blow me away, but should have paid attention to other ratings. I see little (if any) difference between the far cheaper organic brand and this very expensive one. Perhaps for a gourmet or for ceremonial uses, it's worth the investment. For me, my budget, and my everyday use, I won't purchase again. Lesson learned.
customer_reviews.author: DR deLuis

customer_reviews.title: I love this stuff!!!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is amazing! The flavor is much better than others I've tried. I love to have tea in the early morning and this is a great detoxifying tea. It gives me a great boost of energy for the entire day, and curbs my appetite and I love that. The texture is very fine sorta like powdered sugar. Be sure to use a measuring spoon...I mix 1 tsp with about 2 oz of hot water stir until frothy...then I pour it into 5 oz of pineapple orange juice. It's delicious. I highly recommend it! Worth the money. Organic is the way to go!
customer_reviews.author: Tressy S.

customer_reviews.title: The best
customer_reviews.text: This product makes you drop weight fast and if you have good nutrition plan you will see good results and even if you are in good shape, you may need it when it comes to breaking your diet and that’s why I bought it and the best part it’s natural , by the way it’s not like the one you buy it from Target or Walmart, this green tea it’s totally different , just keep your commitment with your nutrition program and third day you will notice different in your weight
customer_reviews.author: Musaab

customer_reviews.title: Best One Yet
customer_reviews.text: I've tried quite a few matcha teas and this one is the best so far. This one's green color is more deep than others that seem to have a more brownish green shade. I bought quite a few at once to compare. This one also is very smooth. I add 1T of matcha to 12 ounces of almond milk and put it in my Blendtec. Add ice & sweeten to taste. Tastes great.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy

customer_reviews.title: Simply delicious
customer_reviews.text: Premium Cacao powder blends smoothly in my smoothies. I feel more energized and awake after mixing it in my almond milk with banana, oats, and a dollop of peanut butter. It was also easy to add to my yogurt by sprinkling a teaspoon over top of a vanilla-strawberry blend. Also ideal for baking, I added some to a batch of oatmeal cookie dough for some added health benefits that raw products produce, and some additional taste/sweetness.
customer_reviews.author: Heather A.

customer_reviews.title: Soooo good!
customer_reviews.text: From the get go, this looks and feels like a high quality product! The packaging is beautiful and I really like that its not flimsy and doesnt feel like it will spill when opened. The powder itself is rich and delicious when used in smoothies & protein shakes. It baked up perfectly in brownies & no bake cookies. I was very happy to replace my crappy store bought cocoa powder with this and will definitely purchase this brand from now on.
customer_reviews.author: rachel ingalls

customer_reviews.title: My new favorite
customer_reviews.text: I recently purchased "healthy works cacao" and wanted to try another brand, I'm glad i did! This one actually taste more like cacao, creamier taste, and it's darker in color. I enjoy everything about it! I do recommend putting the cacao in a glass container, and storing it immediately in the fridge, i did it for both.
customer_reviews.author: Nothing but the truth!

customer_reviews.title: A great middle ground in the world of matcha!
customer_reviews.text: I use this matcha in matcha lattes. If I boil it with the milk, it'll taste a little burned, but this is a given with most matcha powders--this one is much less grassy than many others I've tried. The best way I've found to make the lattes is to mix the matcha with a shot of water using a frother first, then add the matcha "shot" to very warm (not hot) milk and it's perfect! This matcha powder is the closest I've gotten to replicating Starbucks' Green Tea Lattes and isn't as exorbitantly expensive as some of the ceremonial grade stuff out there so I'm a fan!
customer_reviews.author: Kristina Moore

customer_reviews.title: Great Matcha
customer_reviews.text: I love this Matcha so much, I subscribe to it for me and my mom. My sister makes it as a latte, which I drink every day in lieu of coffee latte. The only problem is that it doesn't mix that easily since I don't broil it; I use hot water (just before it reaches a boil.)
customer_reviews.author: Angeb

customer_reviews.title: Priced double from suggested retail price
customer_reviews.text: Product itself is good. But the price is double what the suggested retail price is, I wish I would've looked this up before I purchased this. The bag is very small and you can get it elsewhere for $13.
customer_reviews.author: MC

customer_reviews.title: Color is good, but has no flavor
customer_reviews.text: Bought this product June 2020 after seeing someone use it on IG, reading reviews, and comparing it with other products. Color of this powder is great! Taste is not great at all; in fact there is no matcha taste. The smell is not very fragrant either. When I mix this, it is very thick for some reason. I boil my water in a kettle, so I don't see the temperature of the water being the problem. I also have cheaper matcha from before, and it's much more frothy. I bought Matcha Wellness' 1.5 oz matcha before I bought this product, and it's way better, but obviously more expensive. TDLR: this matcha is not worth your money.
customer_reviews.author: Erika

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE this stuff!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This Matcha powder is AMAZING! If you like matcha then you will love this to have at home for use as you desire. I personally have only used this in smoothies but there are endless uses, for sure. I usually use it with a banana and almond milk with a small amount of honey and ice in a blender! viola! yummy yummy! I just can't get enough of it. The amount of product is sufficient for me for approx 3 weeks. I personally use a little more than the recommended teaspoon per serving, though, so it could last longer for another person depending on their use. If you like matcha then this is the matcha for you!!
customer_reviews.author: JB Capell

customer_reviews.title: A little goes a long way
customer_reviews.text: This is the first time that I have tried Matcha tea, and I have to say that I am hooked. I read about the health benefits of Matcha and figured that I would give it a shot. I tried it a variety of different ways. First I tried it just as tea in hot water, which was OK. Then I added honey... YUM. Then I tried it with honey and some milk... DOUBLE YUM! I can't wait to try it at home blended with some milk, honey and ice or to make a smoothie with it. A little bit of this goes a long way. I love that it comes in a resealable bag to keep it fresh.
customer_reviews.author: Denise

customer_reviews.title: This matcha powder taste great!!
customer_reviews.text: First time trying matcha and it's really tasty. I've made tea & pancakes with matcha and they boh tasted great! Matcha gives me a little boost of energy & a feel good mood. Matcha is a tasty nutritious powder. Glad I found it . I would highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Delicious!
customer_reviews.text: This cacao is so delicious. I have literally used it for brownies, hot chocolate, protein balls, pancakes, shakes. I love that it is organic. This is a brand I can trust. Will definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Kalyn

customer_reviews.title: Packaging my break
customer_reviews.text: I liked the matcha, but the packaging is terrible. The enclosure broke upon opening for the first time. It was not stuck together properly. I would buy another one that is with better packaging.
customer_reviews.author: KE

customer_reviews.title: Great flavor, great price
customer_reviews.text: This is my new favorite caocao powder. Unlike many I've tried, this one isn't bitter and is rich with a nice flavor. It blends/mixes well with both cold and hot liquids. I use it mostly for my protein shakes, and it lends a deep chocolate flavor that makes me feel like I'm indulging in a guilty treat. I also love that the bag comes FULL, which adds to its value for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Looking for Cocao Powder? Look no further
customer_reviews.text: I am not the most avid fan of chocolate, but my family is. The Cocao Powder from Zen Spirit has become a staple in our house. I can easily make smoothies and hot chocolate for the kids - which they love. For me, I love the size of the bag/amount of product you get for the price. The powder has a very smooth consistency. The flavor is bold. Not to be confused with milk chocolate, the Raw Organic Cocao Powder is more bitter - which is expected since it does not have the additional sugar. The flavor does take some getting used to, but it is not unpalatable.
customer_reviews.author: Kyria Phenix

customer_reviews.title: Small package, but lasts a long time.
customer_reviews.text: I've heard all about the health benefits of Macha Tea - it's all over the news and the internet. But other than hints of it mixed in with other teas, I've never really tried it. This package was smaller than I expected, but when you use only a tablespoon for each brew of tea the package actually lasts a decent amount. While I'm not a huge fan of the flavor on its own, I did like mixing my matcha into smoothies and cupcakes. The powder was really fine and easy to integrate without a grainy texture.
customer_reviews.author: Becky Fixel

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful product and service
customer_reviews.text: I use this product as a nutritional supplement...so I am pleased to find a product that is made so well and clean of other fillers...I use a teaspoon a day, either in almond milk, warmed or in my coffee...i definitely will buy this again. It was delivered in time and well packaged. I also love the resealable package it comes in. Great Buy?
customer_reviews.author: Carol Oliveira

customer_reviews.title: Amazing but too expensive
customer_reviews.text: Amazing but too expensive. The pack is really small. Otherwise, I love this matcha. Bag packaging could improve. The seal broke after I opened it a few times. Please make it at least as sturdy as zip lock bags. This seal is almost like those sandwich cheap bags, a bit better, that you can't reseal too many times as they will break.
customer_reviews.author: MsD

customer_reviews.title: To costly for me but great taste!
customer_reviews.text: Truly love this product and I am an avid matcha green tea drinker. The flavor is great and it mixes extremely well. However, I did not purchase this product again because, I drink a match smoothie everyday and with such a small number of servings this is just to costly. My package lasted me less than 2 weeks with me skipping a couple of days due to the small quantity and I only used 1 tsp of powder. There are other products that are not quite as expensive and still taste very good.
customer_reviews.author: Duquesnegirl

customer_reviews.title: To soon to tell
customer_reviews.text: The flavor is not as sweet as a prior one I used, but that being said, I'm statring to get used to this new product. I read about CACAO being used to help lower LDL lipids, and so far it is too soon to tell if this is working. Perhaps my next lipid profile will reveal more.
customer_reviews.author: J. Wilkonski

customer_reviews.title: Makes a difference!
customer_reviews.text: This absolutely helps me lose weight. You have to diet of course but I feel it helps me lose more in a week than without. Definitely boosts energy and mind clarity. I add a teaspoon to either Greek yogurt or a plant based protein smoothie. I've yet made a cup of tea with it. I like the taste. Also this one is price friendly. Culinary grade over ceremonial to me only difference was price. Update: ran out for about two weeks just got my order and back using it today. Biggest thing I noticed was I felt more bloated and less energy without it. This does help flush you out.
customer_reviews.author: msjerseystyle

customer_reviews.title: Delicious and Convenient ORGANIC Matcha!
customer_reviews.text: Great product, glad to know I can purchase online easier than finding it in store. I have tried a few other brands of Matcha tea, this was is as good as any! Blended very smooth, which is definitely a plus. Love that it's organic, and the bag is easier / more compact than some other packaging (cans). If you've never had matcha before, try it in steamed milk, that's my favorite :) Will definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: jessicalynn

customer_reviews.title: Great tasting matcha tea!
customer_reviews.text: This Matcha Green Tea by Zen Spirit has a surprisingly great taste. I have not tried adding the powder to anything other than hot water, but I've read other reviews where people are baking with the powder and also using it as a meat tenderizer...very interesting and something I will have to try!! I enjoy drinking a hot cup of this tea every morning, no sugar. I have noticed an increase in energy through out the day, which helps with my active lifestyle.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Mesa

customer_reviews.title: Great flavor and aroma
customer_reviews.text: I was hesitant when purchasing this, as I'm usually a mainstream brand person. But I really liked it. It has great flavor and aroma. And for the price, theres A LOT. I made 2 cakes from scratch, and 2 batches of icing, and could still easily make another full cake. Glad its raw and organic, which is ultimately what sold me on it.
customer_reviews.author: Jaimie & Brandon J.

customer_reviews.title: Very Energizing -- Use in Morning ONLY
customer_reviews.text: Not sure what the fuss about Matcha is all about! It tastes AWFUL and bitter even when mixed with hot water and non-dairy creamer. The one noticeable effect was that after drinking it at 3:00 pm it kept me awake until 4:00 am (even after taking sleep medication!). Next time I'll use less powder and before noon only.
customer_reviews.author: ANONYMOUS

customer_reviews.title: Authentic matcha, but start off small!
customer_reviews.text: I lived in the tea growing area of Japan for 3 years so I can say this is very high quality tea with some clout. I can also say please be careful when using this tea. Yes it will give you amazing energy as you are ingesting the leaf itself, not just a brew from the leaves. Start with small amounts at first so you know how you will react to the caffeine in this matcha.
customer_reviews.author: A.McClintock

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!!!
customer_reviews.text: Well when I first ordered the product, I was skeptical and chose the one with the least amount. I must say that I'm very much happy with this purchase and you can tell that it's great quality. I drink this as a hot tea every morning when I get home from work and in the evening before I leave. I even compared it to the one in the Vitamin Shoppe and you can tell Zen Spirit is way fresher. I'm now curious to see if Zen Spirit sells other things because I'm very much satisfied and even purchased this order again a few minutes ago.
customer_reviews.author: Brih Renee

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Quality, Great Flavor & Packed with Nutrients
customer_reviews.text: One of the primary factors that attracted me to this particular product was its ingredients and health benefits. I thought it would be something great to add to my daily protein drink for added nutrient and energy. I wasn't expecting it to taste great, however - I anticipated it to be extremely bitter. I am more than pleasantly surprised to have found out what a rich yet subtle flavor the powder has. It's not bitter like I had expected, and it greatly enhanced the flavor of my protein drink. The powder itself is soft and fine and seems high quality, and it smells wonderful. I'm really looking forward to using it in more recipes!
customer_reviews.author: Britt O.

customer_reviews.title: TINY PACKAGING
customer_reviews.text: While the matcha itself is good quality, the package in which it came was unexpectedly tiny. I thought I was getting a bag of it, as pictured. What I got was a VERY EXPENSIVE small sample-sized packet. VERY disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: B. Iaco

product_meta.title: Japanese Premium Culinary Grade, Unsweetened & Sugar Free - USDA & Vegan Certified - 100g (3.52 oz) - Perfect for Baking, Smoothies, Latte, Iced tea & Weight Loss (Premium Culinary Matcha (1.06 oz))
